017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.util;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
023
024import java.util.HexFormat;
025
026import org.apiguardian.api.API;
027import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
028import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.UtilityClass;
029import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError;
030import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.ValidationException;
031
032/**
033 *  <p>{@summary A set of utility methods that are useful for the conversion of
034 *  byte arrays to and from strings of hexadecimal digits.}</p>
035 *  <p>Parts of the code were adopted from the class
036 *  {@code org.apache.catalina.util.HexUtils} (written by Craig R. McClanahan)
037 *  out of the Tomcat source and modified to match the requirements of this
038 *  project.</p>
039 *  <p>Partially, the methods got obsolete with the introduction of
040 *  {@link java.util.HexFormat}
041 *  in Java&nbsp;17.</p>
042 *
043 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
044 *  @thanks Craig R. McClanahan
045 *  @version $Id: HexUtils.java 1022 2022-03-03 23:03:40Z tquadrat $
046 *  @since 0.0.5
047 *
048 *  @UMLGraph.link
049 */
050@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: HexUtils.java 1022 2022-03-03 23:03:40Z tquadrat $" )
051@UtilityClass
052public final class HexUtils
053{
054        /*--------------*\
055    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
056        \*--------------*/
057    /**
058     *  No instance of this class is allowed.
059     */
060    private HexUtils() { throw new PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError( HexUtils.class ); }
061
062        /*---------*\
063    ====** Methods **==========================================================
064        \*---------*/
065    /**
066     *  <p>{@summary Converts a String of hexadecimal digits into the
067     *  corresponding byte array by encoding each two hexadecimal digits as a
068     *  byte.} The method will not distinguish between upper or lower case for
069     *  the digit from {@code 0xA} to {@code 0xF}.</p>
070     *  <p>If the number of digits in the String is odd, the String will be
071     *  <i>prefixed</i> by an additional 0.</p>
072     *
073     *  @param  digits  Hexadecimal digits representation.
074     *  @return The resulting byte array.
075     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException The input String is {@code null},
076     *      empty, or it contains an invalid character that cannot be
077     *      interpreted as a hexadecimal digit.
078     */
079    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
080    public static byte[] convertFromHexString( final CharSequence digits )
081    {
082        final var len = requireNotEmptyArgument( digits, "digits" ).length();
083        final var buffer = new StringBuilder( len + 1 );
084        if( len % 2 > 0 ) buffer.append( '0' );
085        buffer.append( digits );
086        final var retValue = HexFormat.of().parseHex( buffer );
087
088        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
089        return retValue;
090    }   //  convertFromHexString()
091
092    /**
093     *  Converts an array of hexadecimal digits into the corresponding byte
094     *  array by encoding each two hexadecimal digits as a byte. The method
095     *  will not distinguish between upper or lower case for the digit from
096     *  {@code 0xA} to {@code 0xF}.<br>
097     *  <br>If the number of digits in the array is odd, an additional 0 will
098     *  <i>prepended</i> to it.
099     *
100     *  @param  digits  Hexadecimal digits representation.
101     *  @return The resulting byte array.
102     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException The input array is {@code null},
103     *      empty, or it contains an invalid character that cannot be
104     *      interpreted as a hexadecimal digit.
105     */
106    @SuppressWarnings( "MethodCanBeVariableArityMethod" )
107    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
108    public static final byte[] convertFromHexCharArray( final char [] digits )
109    {
110        final var retValue = convertFromHexString( new String( requireNotEmptyArgument( digits, "digits" ) ) );
111
112        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
113        return retValue;
114    }   //  convertFromHexCharArray()
115
116    /**
117     *  Converts an integer in the range form 0 to 15 to a hex digit.
118     *
119     *  @param  value   The value to convert.
120     *  @return The hex digit (uppercase).
121     */
122    @SuppressWarnings( "MagicNumber" )
123    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
124    public static final char convertToHexDigit( final int value )
125    {
126        if( (value < 0) || (value > 15) )
127        {
128            throw new ValidationException( format( "The value %1$d cannot be converted to a single HexDigit", value ) );
129        }
130
131        final var retValue = HexFormat.of().withUpperCase().toLowHexDigit( value );
132
133        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
134        return retValue;
135    }   //  convertToHexDigit()
136
137    /**
138     *  Converts an array of bytes to a hex string where the digits from
139     *  {@code 0xA} to {@code 0xF} are all uppercase.
140     *
141     *  @param  bytes   The byte array.
142     *  @return The converted string.
143     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The given byte array is
144     *      {@code null} or empty.
145     *
146     *  @deprecated Use
147     *      {@link java.util.HexFormat#formatHex(byte[])}
148     *      instead, like this:
149     *      <pre><code>String s = HexFormat.of().withUpperCase().formatHex( bytes );</code></pre>
150     */
151    @SuppressWarnings( "DeprecatedIsStillUsed" )
152    @Deprecated( since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true )
153    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
154    public static final String convertToHexString( final byte[] bytes ) throws IllegalArgumentException
155    {
156        final var retValue = HexFormat.of().withUpperCase().formatHex( requireNotEmptyArgument( bytes, "bytes" ) );
157
158        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
159        return retValue;
160    }   //  convertToHexString()
161}
162//  class HexUtils
163
164/*
165 *  End of File
166 */
